rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0002
rows.name:
The Nyoka Drifts are snowswept
landscape where man rarely sets foot...

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But I've been hearing that the snow
has been melting there recently.

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I welcome the prospect of an end to
the long Luxurian winter, but...

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0005
rows.name:
someone will still need to keep an
eye on things.

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Because it's possible that this problem
could spread to all regions of Luxuria.

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0007
rows.name: That's what I was hoping you'd say.

rows.label: tlk44400287_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Look into things and find the reason
for all this.
